targets.query:
db.Total.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $group: { _id: { gender: "$values.user_gender" }, 
              login: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.login" } },
              logout: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.logout" } },
              menu_nolabel: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_nolabel" } },
              menu_eco1: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_eco1" } },
              menu_eco2: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_eco2" } },
              menu_lesswaste: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_lesswaste" } },
              ecopoint1_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.ecopoint1_click" } },
              ecopoint2_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.ecopoint2_click" } },
              lesswaste_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.lesswaste_click" } },
              nolabel_search: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.nolabel_search" } },
              nolabel_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.nolabel_click" } },
            } 
  }
])

panels.title: 성별에 따른 각 메뉴 이용 횟수

targets.query:
db.Total.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $group: { _id: { age: "$values.user_age" }, 
              login: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.login" } },
              logout: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.logout" } },
              menu_nolabel: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_nolabel" } },
              menu_eco1: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_eco1" } },
              menu_eco2: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_eco2" } },
              menu_lesswaste: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.menu_lesswaste" } },
              ecopoint1_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.ecopoint1_click" } },
              ecopoint2_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.ecopoint2_click" } },
              lesswaste_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.lesswaste_click" } },
              nolabel_search: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.nolabel_search" } },
              nolabel_click: { "$sum": { $toInt: "$values.nolabel_click" } },
            } 
  },
  { $sort : { "_id.age": 1 } }
])

panels.title: 연령에 따른 각 메뉴 이용 횟수
성별에 따른 일주일 간 적립 에코포인트
성별에 따른 일주일 간 적립 에코포인트

targets.query:
db.Lesswaste.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $group: { "_id": { radius: "$values.radius_km", gender:"$values.user_gender" }, 
              "total": {"$sum": "$values.count"} } },
  { $addFields: { M_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["M", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { W_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["W", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { none_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["none", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $group: { "_id": "$_id.radius", "M":{"$sum": "$M_count"}, "W":{"$sum": "$W_count"}, "unregister":{"$sum": "$none_count"} } },
  { $sort : {_id: 1} },
  { $addFields: { _id: {$concat: [{ $toString: "$_id" }, 'km'] } } }
])

targets.parsedQuery:
db.Lesswaste.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $group: { "_id": { radius: "$values.radius_km", age:"$values.user_age" }, 
              "total": {"$sum": "$values.count"} } },
  { $addFields: { 10_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [10, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 20_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [20, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 30_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [30, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 40_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [40, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 50_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [50, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 60_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [60, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { none_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [99, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $group: { "_id": "$_id.radius", "10":{"$sum": "$10_count"}, "20":{"$sum": "$20_count"}, "30":{"$sum": "$30_count"}, "40":{"$sum": "$40_count"}, "50":{"$sum": "$50_count"}, "60":{"$sum": "$60_count"}, "unregister":{"$sum": "$none_count"} } },
  { $sort: { "_id" : 1 } },
  { $addFields: { "_id"  : { $concat: [{$toString: "$_id"}, "km"] } } }
])
targets.query:
db.Lesswaste.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $group: { "_id": { radius: "$values.radius_km", age:"$values.user_age" }, 
              "total": {"$sum": "$values.count"} } },
  { $addFields: { 10_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [10, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 20_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [20, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 30_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [30, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 40_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [40, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 50_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [50, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { 60_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [60, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { none_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: [99, "$_id.age"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $group: { "_id": "$_id.radius", "10":{"$sum": "$10_count"}, "20":{"$sum": "$20_count"}, "30":{"$sum": "$30_count"}, "40":{"$sum": "$40_count"}, "50":{"$sum": "$50_count"}, "60":{"$sum": "$60_count"}, "unregister":{"$sum": "$none_count"} } },
  { $sort: { "_id" : 1 } },
  { $addFields: { "_id"  : { $concat: [{$toString: "$_id"}, "km"] } } }
])

db.NolabelClick.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $addFields: { price: { $floor: { $multiply: ["$values.price_min", 0.005] } } } },
  { $addFields: { price: { $multiply: ["$price", 200] } } },
  { $group: { "_id": { price: "$price", gender:"$values.user_gender" }, 
              "total": {"$sum": "$values.count"} } },
  { $addFields: { M_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["M", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { W_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["W", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $addFields: { none_count: { $cond: { if: { $eq: ["none", "$_id.gender"] }, then: "$total", else: 0 } } } },
  { $group: { "_id": "$_id.price", "M_count":{"$sum": "$M_count"}, "W_count":{"$sum": "$W_count"}, "none_count":{"$sum": "$none_count"} } },
  { $sort : {_id: 1} }
])

db.NolabelSearch.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $match: { "values.user_gender": "W" } },
  { $group: { _id: { keyword: "$values.keyword" }, count: { $sum: "$values.count" } } },
	{ $sort: { count: -1 } },
  { $limit: 10 },
  { $addFields: { W_rank: "$_id.keyword" } },
  { $project: { "_id.keyword":0, count:0 } }
])

db.NolabelSearch.aggregate([
  { $unwind: "$values" },
  { $match: { "values.user_gender": "M" } },
  { $group: { _id: { keyword: "$values.keyword" }, count: { $sum: "$values.count" } } },
	{ $sort: { count: -1 } },
  { $limit: 10 },
  { $addFields: { M_rank: "$_id.keyword" } },
  { $project: { "_id.keyword":0, count:0 } }
])
